properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 13 at 1:06PM CST until March 4 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Mississippi River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Mississippi River at Tunica Riverpark
* from Friday February 14 until Tuesday March 03.
* At 11 AM Thursday the stage was...40.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 47.0 feet on Sunday February 23.
* Flood stage is 41.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Friday February 14 and
continue to rise to near 47.0 feet by Sunday February 23. The river
will fall below flood stage by Tuesday March 03.
* At 47.0 feet...In Mississippi, water is going over Charlie Lane.
Smokey Lane is being covered. Lots on east end of Deer Crossing are
flooding. Water is over north end of Sauger Lane.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Friday morning or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
